item.title: Orbital Blues Character Sheet
item.description: image of character sheet link to pdf and source link to orbital blues see you space cowboy design notes horizontal cause that’s how I roll inspired by orbital blues’ retro typography and layout, and its generous tracking special attention paid to lines connecting or not connecting montserrat is pretty archivo felt right league spartan for a further throwback feel, imitating the book’s style Source code discussion another typst joint Data structure make a dictionary, pass it in.
